modName: Simple Reading - Remove Book Menu UI
summary: A [i]simple[/i] mod that removes the unnecessary UI elements when the player is reading a book. Now with additional options to better suit your needs!
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][img]http://i.imgur.com/pJeTZWS.png[/img][youtube]iwWRCOCTWB4[/youtube][/center][b][center][i]Wow! I'm surprised this video exists! Special thanks to ToggleAI. Do me a favor and check out his channel, will ya'?[url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCd1hrhr-Z4TzAGGO3tRN47g]
[/url][/i][/center]DESCRIPTION[/b]
This mod removes both the button prompts as well as the accompanying tutorial text from the bottom border of the screen when the player is reading a book. I highly recommend using this in conjunction with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35399/?]Book Covers Skyrim[/url] and its expansion [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57120/?]Lost Library[/url] for the optimal bookworm experience.

[center][img]https://i.imgur.com/eFSz80o.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][/center][b]MANUAL INSTALLATION[/b]
Simply place the included [i]bookmenu.swf[/i] file into the [i]Data/Interface[/i] folder found in your Skyrim install directory.
Uninstallation is as easy as removing this file.

[b]CHANGELOG
[/b]Version 1.2
- Main file redone in a more stable fashion. Same visual effect, different implementation.
[i](v1.0 gutted large portions of the action script, while v1.2 takes a safer approach and edits individual variables instead. I should note that both v1.1 T&S optional files were done in this 'safer' fashion, so they do not need an update.)[/i]
Version 1.1
- Added two optional files that show the 'Take' or 'Steal' prompts with or without buttons.
Version 1.0
- Initial release.
